markdown.markdownText: ![Kubernetes Logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/39/Kubernetes_logo_without_workmark.svg/120px-Kubernetes_logo_without_workmark.svg.png) ### Our Kubernetes dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into the scale, status, and resource utilization of your Kubernetes clusters and its resources. Further reading for Kubernetes monitoring * Best practice for Monitoring Kubernetes with Coralogix * Coralogix Kubernetes integration docs

widgets.title: Total failed, pending, or unknown pods
Total avg CPU utilization [ Pod | Container ]
Node network i/o errors rx tx
CPU usage (mCPU) for all pods by namespace [5m]
Total memory usage in GiB for all pods by namespace
Total network traffic rx / tx in MB by all pods by namespace [5m]
Total number of container restarts for all pods by namespace [range]
Total % of CPU throttling for all containers in each namespace & container [5m]
widgets.description: Helps identify namespaces & containers where containers are being throttled due to CPU limits

promqlQuery.value: sum by (namespace, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace!=""}[5m])) / sum by (namespace, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace!=""}[5m])) * 100

widgets.title: Pods in failed, pending, or unknown state by namespaces
Pods in ready state by node
Container state waiting | ready | pending | terminated
Container status last terminated reason (by Pod)
Distribution of container termination reason by pod
Containers terminated with OOM Killed (by pod)
Container network packets dropped [ rx, tx ] by pod
Network errors [ rx, tx ] by pod
Network rate [ bytes rx / tx ] by pod
Total storage used by all PVCs across nodes
Total storage used by each PVC
PV where < 90% of capacity is available.
Total storage requested by each PVC
PVC in pending phase by Kubernetes node
Max PV capacity by PV and k8s node
